mapper.select: insert into pro_qna( NO, PRO_QNA_TITLE, PRO_QNA_CONTENT, PRO_QNA_PWD, PRO_QNA_DATE, PRO_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRO_QNA_TYPE_CODE, QNA_STATUS_CODE ) values( seq_comment.nextval, #{pro_qna_title}, #{pro_qna_content}, #{pro_qna_pwd}, sysdate, #{pro_no}, #{member_no}, #{PRO_QNA_TYPE_CODE}, #{QNA_STATUS_CODE})
mapper.update: update pro_qna set no=#{no}, PRO_QNA_TITLE=#{pro_qna_title}, PRO_QNA_CONTENT=#{pro_qna_content}, PRO_QNA_PWD=#{PRO_QNA_PWD}, PRO_QNA_DATE=#{PRO_QNA_DATE}, PRO_NO=#{PRO_NO}, MEMBER_NO=#{MEMBER_NO}, PRO_QNA_TYPE_CODE=#{PRO_QNA_TYPE_CODE}, QNA_STATUS_CODE=#{QNA_STATUS_CODE}
